name: Avoid! (itch) (igorbdamata)
description:
The gameplay is quite simple. You are the white circle and you must avoid the orange circles to survive. When an orange circle hits the edge of the screen, you get some score points. Seek the highest score possible!

Tools used to develop the game

This game was made using Javascript and the p5.js library. I've decided to use Javascript for learning purposes, and the p5.js because i thought (and think) that this is a pretty easy and useful tool, making the development faster and more fun.

Credits

This game was programmed by Igor B. da Mata;
The sounds are also made by Igor B. da Mata;
All arts come from p5.js library;
The text font used by this game is: ShantellSans (Regular);
